description: Damages and pushes back all entities in the specified range.

particle.description: Specifies the type of the particle which is used to visualize the function.

range.description: Specifies the range of the seismic wave.

factor.description: Specifies how much to push the surrounding entities back.

height.description: Specifies how high to push the surrounding entities.

damage.description: Specifies the damage to deal to the surrounding entities.

duration.description: Specifies the duration in ticks (1 second = 20 ticks).
